g:VerticalPanel.g:Label: Enter a keyword here to go to the address. You can just go to http://kkey.in/%s to go to the page
g:VerticalPanel.g:InlineHTML: Add http://kkey.in/%s as a search engine on chrome. Follow the instructions here.
Some defaults have been added. Try 'm', 'fb' , 'tm' or 'w' above
